reviewText: Love it!!! Exactly how it was said to be!!!

I'm glad I lived long enough to FINALLY find a DVD that provides TOP SHELF instructional methods to achieve the sounds of SCOTTY MOORE"S. Thanks and I WILL continue to search your LIBRARY for additional DVDS. THANKS MILLIONS. Jerry
The DVD showed me how to play the licks that I've been trying for ages.  To pick up speed:  Practice, Practice, Practice.
